title: Fused pointwise kernels for GRU/LSTM
body_html:
Finished fused pointwise kernel for GRU. Created this PR to start collecting comments while I implement LSTM.

One thing I'm having a little trouble with is scope of TensorSigmoidOp in torch/lib/THCUNN/FusedRNNKernel.cu when I tried to add #include <THC/THCTensorMathPointwise.cuh> I get a No such file or directory error. This is why I copied the function over.

Finished fused pointwise kernel for GRU. Created this PR to start collecting comments while I implement LSTM.

One thing I'm having a little trouble with is scope of ```TensorSigmoidOp``` in ```torch/lib/THCUNN/FusedRNNKernel.cu``` when I tried to add ```#include <THC/THCTensorMathPointwise.cuh>``` I get a ```No such file or directory``` error. This is why I copied the function over.
